website_summaries.verdict: This stylish pillow gently supports your baby's head without any padding that could put their neck at an uncomfortable angle.
pros: Comes in 37 fun colors and patterns
Thin middle section gently supports your baby's head and neck without being too thick
cons: Some say that the middle section is too small and the side pillows push the baby's ears in

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was born breech and was diagnosed with torticollis at 2 months and showed some signs of flathead syndrome. Bought this and began using it in the car seat and while playing as well as doing recommended torticollis exercises and she now no longer has torticollis or any signed of flathead syndrome. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Newell

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had infant torticollis and needed physical therapy. She always tilted her head and it was the worst in her car seat. This pillow gives her the support to keep her head straight and I know she’s comfortable when she’s napping!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The flat part is not long enough. My 2 months old baby's head just barely fits in -it seems to suffocate my baby's head/ears as the elephant ears pushes in when the weight of the baby's head is applied to the flat part. I can't even return it because the seller doesn't provide free return. :-I I should've read that before I ordered it. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, especially if you know how to sew.
customer_reviews.text: If you can sew you can make this. It looks like a home ec project! It really does a great job holding the head and preventing my baby from flopping around when he's asleep and I'm driving. But if I knew how, I could've sewn some cotton between fabric (you can see the big stitches) for less than half the price. Great concept but grossly overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: cheluzal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow for my son who has very little head control!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: ) good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A little shocking to unbox! :) good quality product, just as described. I agree with other reviews that the inside fabric is too wide, allowing baby to turn their head side to side. I like the heart shaped memory foam one better.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love the pillow great head support
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. Helps keep my daughters head supported while she sleeps. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: handstriker909

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted them to be
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm disappointed about is that I didn't buy them sooner. I bought them a little worried they would be too small for my 3 year old and 1 year old, but they did not disappoint. Even in an upright carseat with no head support, it gives my 3 year old enough cushion that her head doesn't go everywhere when she falls asleep. And even more of a shocker, is they both like them enough to leave them alone and even use by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Highlander

customer_reviews.title: I love the Elephant Ears
customer_reviews.text: I love the Elephant Ears! They are a great support for our babys head. Before we bought that item, it gave me a headache to see her head moving from one side to another, all the time while driving the car. But with this support pillow her head stays in place while shes sitting in her carseat. I definitely recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this pillow a short time but I’m pleasantly pleased with it so far. My daughter has torticollis and also has a heart defect. I always find myself checking her breathing but I feel with this pillow it allows her airways to remain open and not constricted, giving mom peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: SNichole

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for added head and neck support in a jogging stroller. Now that my daughter is a little older she can pull it out from behind her and ends up dropping it out of the stroller, so it would be a plus if it had an attachment on it somehow, but she is also old enough to not really need it anymore. I still use it when I expect her to nap on a run though and it seems more comfortable for her!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Frye

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable head support available
customer_reviews.text: This little pillow is amazingly supportive for a baby's head without limiting their own movements, blocking their view or pushing their heads forward uncomfortably. In fact, when we were in Chicago's Shirley Ryan Abilities Lab (one of the premier rehabilitation centers in the US), therapists were wowed by the pillow, its comfort and effectiveness. They have a multitude of equipment for babies, too, and not only approved this but wanted to know where we got it! This is just perfect for giving your baby just the right amount of support in the car seat, stroller or cradle seat.
customer_reviews.author: Valthinking

customer_reviews.title: There it seems to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be use on a car seat, to help my baby's head to stay in place and not being dropped every time she fall sleep. The pillow just created a bulk on the back of baby's head, so it was hard to work with. Also, baby felt uncomfortable and always take out the pillow. For the only thing it has worked for us is to be used on the umbrella stroller, to keep head centered and in place with the movement and while sleeping. There it seems to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best car seat head pillow I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: The best car seat head pillow I’ve tried. The fit my daughter perfectly. I went through 3 other options and this was the most secure and comfortable pillow for my baby’s neck and head. I would recommend to any new parent and even give this as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love these! Our baby girl was very tiny when ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these! Our baby girl was very tiny when she was born (just under 6 lbs) and these are awesome for supporting her little bobble head in the carseat. They keep her head straight and comfortable. It makes me feel so much better knowing that her head isn't rocking around or flopping forward in the back seat when I can't see her.
customer_reviews.author: MLSibley

customer_reviews.title: Seriously perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the pirate design is adorable. Our little one has torticollis and this has improved his issues x100. We use it in the car seat, swing and rock and play. NOT THE BASSINET. Take a chance and purchase this, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Haley3215

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: this pillow is great. we use it on the changing table to help keep baby stationary. the middle strip of fabric has no padding whatsoever, but thats because it was meant for a carseat. haven't tried it in the car yet but seems like it would work
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to use this to keep my toddlers head from flopping down when she sleeps in her car seat on long car rides but it wouldn’t fit, so we really have no use for it now. I think it is a great idea, but a little pricey for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie B

customer_reviews.title: Supper supportive
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Definitely serve their purpose. I do feel like the kind of push my baby’s head forward a bit (she’s suppper tiny) but it is much better than her head wobbling from side to side in her car seat. My neighbor recommended these to me.. and I for sure would recommend them for moms
customer_reviews.author: Athina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite support as indicated
customer_reviews.text: My stroller is built for my toddler to ride along on the back. Therefore, the baby seat does not recline much at all. I needed something to keep baby's head from slumping down. I used this with great hopes of fixing, but was disappointed. It does not say behind my 8 month old's head, it pushes up and doesn't bring the support I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but supportive
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my babys swing and bouncer becaise I noticed he kept favoring his left side of his head. Its amazing at keeping his head still and looks so cute! The grey definately makes it look like "elephant ears". I do think it is a little pricey for what it is, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Baby neck or head pillow.
customer_reviews.text: The picture doesn’t do it justice. The flaps that are cushions are too fluffy and they’re very close to each other. Feels more uncomfortable than anything and a rolled up towel, blanket or cloth does a better job.
customer_reviews.author: MrMeelad

customer_reviews.title: Lots of designs to choose from
customer_reviews.text: My preemie was developing a flat spot on one side of his head and this was recommended to me by his physical therapist. We use it in his car seat and sometimes while on his activity mat. He doesn't seem to mind it and it comes in about 30 different designs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: What a great invention! I love this for my daughter and am thinking of getting a second one so that I don’t carry our first one with me from the car to the swing to the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much that I ordered two. One for swing and other for bassinet. My son always slept with head facing left. I would move him to sleep straight but his had would go back to left. So I ordered this pillow to make sure he sleeps in all positions. It’s perfect for his head.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use myself
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought an adjustable bed and found that a regular pillow raised my head too much, but going without anything at all caused my head to loll uncomfortably to the side. This pillow was the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Michele with one L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, every parent needs!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product for anyone who has head issues with baby or is trying to prevent them. Get right from the start. Wish I had known about this. Especially for when going long distance in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sounhein

customer_reviews.title: Best baby product EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best gifts I had ever gotten when my son was born and now I buy for all my friends for their baby shower gift! So incredibly simple to use. It really helps to keep your infants head secure in the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Langehennig

customer_reviews.title: This helps support baby's head perfectly & items I thought might be useless now work for us
customer_reviews.text: First time mom here didn't know to pick a bouncer & swing that cradled baby's head. Her ear was basically on her shoulder (head tipped sideways) in the ones I got. This helps support baby's head perfectly & items I thought might be useless now work for us!
customer_reviews.author: cjsbooks11

customer_reviews.title: Not very universal
customer_reviews.text: The middle strip is too short. My baby’s head doesn’t even fit inside. Also, we have a Maxi Cosi seat which is very plush so this pillow literally doesn’t even fit without basically needing to forcefully shove your baby’s face back into it. Can’t find the packaging otherwise I would return this.
customer_reviews.author: Mango Mood

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, she is unable to keep her head in midline due to weak neck muscles. I was expecting them to be a little firmer like a memory foam type, but they’re more of a soft pillow. They work in her car seat but not on the floor or cradle, she is able to turn her head side to side the way she prefers with little restriction,i Would say they could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for Torticollis, keeps head straight!
customer_reviews.text: ....i used this to help support my 8 week infant who has mild Torticollis. It works great!!! This brand came recommended by a physical therapist when I did some online research. I can highly recommend it. I don’t let my baby sleep in it overnight but use it throughout the day in rocker, stroller and car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Head Support to keep baby's head round and straight
customer_reviews.text: This head support is really awesome thing to have for a baby. Wonderful upgrade from the standard head supports, also provides the the amazing benefit of keeping the adorable little round heads round, not flat. You can use it in graco swing, inside the crib or car seat
customer_reviews.author: First time mother

customer_reviews.title: Must have for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, someone gifted one to me for my newborn and I gifted this one to my sister in law. It’s a must have for a newborn, we mostly used during daytime naps and in the regular stroller (not the car seat)
customer_reviews.author: DianaB

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Im glad I found this for my baby, I have bought and tried soooo many things to prevent her head from turning to one side. I am glad i found this, i bought 2 best 50$ spent
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Cynthia Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: I think this has been helping with my daughter's plagiocephaly! Her head is finally rounding out. I don't know that there's a way around this but I just don't like how it folds her ears. They are always bent forward with this. I guess there's not much to do about it though.
customer_reviews.author: Moslof

customer_reviews.title: Great support for infants.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would support our newborn’s head better without compromising the safety of her car seat, and this was the perfect answer. She now looks comfortable in her seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft. I originally ordered this for my baby girl’s car seat, but I’ve used it more in the baby swing/bouncy seat. It doesn’t attach in any way to baby gear, and I find it doesn’t stay in place well in the car seat. But it does seem to make my babe more comfortable in her swing and bouncy seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Wynn

customer_reviews.title: A MUST!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have! Had one almost 3 years ago with my first daughter. Forgot to register for it went on immediately and orders.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tester

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pillow I bought for my son with torticollis
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pillow I bought for my son with torticollis! It keeps his head in midline and shoulders down while he is in the car seat or in his rock n play. Love this! And such cute prints!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger kids, too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for the preschoolers who was jealous of the baby. It works great keeping his head/neck comfy in the car.
customer_reviews.author: AmazoRN

customer_reviews.title: Works great, 1 star docked for price
customer_reviews.text: My son has hypotonia and this helps him sit up straighter in the stroller. The price is steep for what it is, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received a set of these ears when my first son was born. They are one of the best items I received. I have since purchased a second set for my son so I have them available everywhere, plus, I purchased a set for my new nephew. They are fantastic at keeping baby's chin off of his chest and also helps to prevent from the sides of his head becoming flat in those first few months. I highly suggest this item.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Evanto

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My babysitter uses it in a rocker she has for my little one. She loves it. It's a little to big to fit in a car seat but would probably work in a booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support
customer_reviews.text: My son was born 27 weeks. He ended up with terrible torticollis. I tried several different products and this is the best. The support is incredible to keep his head straight in the car seat and bouncy chair. He is now 7 months and i still is it in his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: kristina slattery

customer_reviews.title: good but strap small
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping babies head midline. As he got bigger it started to push his head forward a little more than was comfortable. He is five months old but has a large head.
customer_reviews.author: endurance121Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it! She has Congenital Torticollis and this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter yesterday and WOW! Love it! She has Congenital Torticollis and this product helps her keep her head and neck in alignment in those awful car seats. Usually her head just hangs so uncomfortably to the side. This will be great for short and long car rides. Would recommend it to any child, torticollis or not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BABY GOT FLAT HEAD AFTER USING THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU WANT A FLAT HEAD FOR YOUR CHILD. My baby used this for a month on stroller and car seat. Before that, she has a good shape head. She is currently 7 month, and after a month of using this, she GOT FLAT HEAD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and cute product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Wish I had thought of this. I recommend use for strollers and car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Great support for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: This provides so much better support for my newborns head than the original padding of the car seat. It keeps her neck from bending forward or to the side when she falls asleep and holds her head in place. I recommended this item to my mommy to be friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. The only downfall is that there is no way to secure the pillow to the stroller seat, but I does work great!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Suggested by our baby’s therapist. It helped keep his head neutral and we are showing improvements in his head shape
customer_reviews.author: dpowell

customer_reviews.title: Not his favorite but he tolerated it and it helped a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little one started to present a flat head on his right side so we bought this pillow to help correcting his position when he was in the rock n play and the bouncer. Not his favorite but he tolerated it and it helped a lot even if it won't fix it. It is probably more efficient in prevention and it looks cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and even the Doctor liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for each new, or new to be great grandsons. The one is already here, and is being used. They really like how it fits the baby’s head. Even her baby’s Doctor had looked at it and liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old had just recently been diagnosed with Cerebral palsy, as we wait to get treatment started and equipment provided. This has been very helpful for her comfort and a bit of support in her stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyesmama

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my twins and I love them so far! my son has torticollis and tis helps to keep his straight forward and balanced. I ordered one for my daughter as I've noticed her head is starting to droop in her carseat and it fits perfectly! I would recommend for anyone that has a little one!
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Adkins III

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our new month old granddaughter so that her neck would be straight in her car seat instead of scrunched. My daughter uses it not only in the car seat, but also when she is lying on the blanket or resting against the boppy pillow. It is so soft and performs just as advertised. She has a couple of other head supports that she could be using but this is the one that is used exclusively. Very glad that I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Retired and loving it

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Physical Therapist
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was recommended by my daughter's physical therapist to treat her torticollis. We used it in her car seat and stroller until she was able to hold her own head up. It provided far more support than the pillow that was already in the car seat and worked really well. Also has such cute prints.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Baby must be watched
customer_reviews.text: Good pillow- can’t call it great. My daughter is one month old with torticollis. It supports her head very well- maybe too well. She was sleeping with it in her bouncer and she woke up violently coughing- she have to spit up and couldn’t turn her head to spit it out. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my daughters slight torticollis. She doesn’t seem to mind using it (7months old)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the product is great used with other baby
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Uppababy Mesa carseat unless you remove a significant amount of stuffing. The Mesa's thick headrest make the area to narrow for the plush ears. Otherwise the product is great used with other baby holders
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pillow! I only wish I could’ve gotten a different print but that’s no reason to take a star away lol. If anything that speaks to how popular these are and for a good reason. Definitely helped keep my little one’s head from digging into his neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but over priced
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product, can’t say I loved the price. Would have bought more if it was lower in price.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with This Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this purchase. We’ve only had it for about a week, but so far, so good. It took a few times of using it for my 2.5 month old to get used to it. The quality seems great too. Bonus: the baby looks adorable with “elephant ears.”
customer_reviews.author: CKLimberg

customer_reviews.title: didn't work like I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: it made her head push forward int he car seat instead of just cushioning the sides. didn't work like I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: S.Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for torticollis!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with my son’s torticollis. It works perfectly for the car seat and swing. It’s large enough to really hold his head in place and the designs are super cute. Plus it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: mom24

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: We got this pillow because my sister-in-law used it for her kids. I would also highly recommend. For us a pattern with a visible up and down was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Jordan  Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow and print
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pillow, it helps with my sons head tilt since he has torticollis. He still finds a way to tilt his head, but I’m sure that’s just him and not he product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute my baby is not here yet but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute my baby is not here yet but it seems like a really good quality looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette O.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slick.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first but she out grew it super fast. After a couples of weeks it wouldn't work in the carseat anymore. Works great still in the swing and bouncy seat. She gets really sweaty with it but it works great. Would have given it 5 stars if she didn't out grow the carseat use so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Fal B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my new little nephew and according to my sister he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chuy and Kylo

customer_reviews.title: A must buy, especially for babies with weak muscles
customer_reviews.text: Our little ones physical therapist recommended these. They really helped her work in holding her head straight. We not only used them in her car seat, but also when she laid on her playmat. Very comfy and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle
customer_reviews.text: The ‘Twinkle’ patten has pink clouds... not white/tan like the picture suggests. Not a favorable choice for my baby boy.
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Infants Must-Have
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and beautiful. A luxurious feel and look overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chcltmel

customer_reviews.title: Bubba loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is a preemie so it really helps him maintain head control while in the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: NICUmomma

customer_reviews.title: Incredible head support!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this head support pillow! My daughter has slight torticollis and favors turning her head to her right side. This pillow helps support her head and keep it in line with the rest of her body. We haven’t tried it out in her car seat yet but I am incredibly optimistic!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Head Support!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but after MANY tries with other head supports for our newborn son’s car seat! This was definitely the answer! It keeps his head in a midlign position perfectly. I feel much better about him being in his car seat now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good pillow for head support and wry neck in babies
customer_reviews.author: Darya Sledzinskaya

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended this pillow so my daughters head wouldn't sit flat ...
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this pillow so my daughters head wouldn't sit flat on the back of the car seat, However as she wiggles around her ears get folded forward. It looks like it is going to cause more problems than it will fix.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Supports babies head nicely
customer_reviews.text: New grandbaby item. Her little head is supported nicely and looks cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Stivender

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pillow! The flat middle doesn’t push their head forward like most pillows. Dahlia is a beautiful pattern.
customer_reviews.author: kesha

customer_reviews.title: Support is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The baby elephant ears are the perfect added support for any car seat without compromising safety.
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Lyne

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my baby’s head nice and straight He does get a little sweaty but other than that it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughters physical therapist recommended I buy these for head support while she was in her car seat. So as soon as they arrived in tested them out. Perfect! They are helping my daughter keep her head straight. Such a cute pattern. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: AFwifey

customer_reviews.title: A dud
customer_reviews.text: We only got to use this a handful of times before the seams started to come apart. Maybe it was a fluke, but the pillow we received wasn’t of good quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Porter

customer_reviews.title: This pillow was great for helping my newborn (up to 4 months) not ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great for helping my newborn (up to 4 months) not always turn to the right. We used it when she was napping in her bouncer, swing or bassinet in the same room as we were.
customer_reviews.author: FrancesO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product and the concept seemed great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and the concept seemed great, but we had to return it (which Amazon was really cool about). It didn't work for our son and one side of the elephant ears kept slipping behind his head while he was in the car seat. Maybe check car seat compatibility; we have a britax B 35 which seems to be narrow than some other car seats. So that could have been why.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect, it’s supports his head just as we need! He seems more comfortable in his stroller and let’s me put him down for more than 5 min🤣
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great little head support
customer_reviews.text: We used this along with a body support system in our baby's swing. The material is soft, has a fun print, and did a great job at cradling our baby's head/keeping it from dipping or dropping to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Kat15613

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 month old w/ torticollis and a flat spot for his stroller where he slumps to one side. Works great I love these things! Wish I had them early on they may have helped prevent his flat spot.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed. Physical therapy recommended elephant ears for my twins and these have helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferLynn

customer_reviews.title: They work if your baby can stand it
customer_reviews.text: The print is nice but I didn't realize the other side had a silver and black swirl design that I didn't care for. My son does not like them, he hates that his head movement is restricted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: The print is absolutely adorable; perfect for a little boy. The functionality is great too, and helps my kids while trying to sleep in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Galey

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Preemies!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended by the OT at the hospital for our preemie, and were great! Helped to keep her tiny head centered in the car seat, giving us peace of mine. Plus the print is adorable!
customer_reviews.author: S. Novak

customer_reviews.title: It works :)
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared of my baby rolling so I bought this. And I love it! He doesn't turn anymore, and his head is straight :)
customer_reviews.author: Austin McAllister

customer_reviews.title: We don't use these often because our daughter seems to be doing better with her torticollis but it has come in handy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. We don't use these often because our daughter seems to be doing better with her torticollis but it has come in handy a few times for her comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: I love love love elephant ears
customer_reviews.text: I love love love elephant ears! I have a special needs granddaughter and it's been very hard to find the right support for her head. She's 3 years old and nothing has worked until I found this! It supports her just right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! This and a matching blanket were a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: moparchx

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We use it in the stroller for our infant and it helps her head stay aligned.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies only
customer_reviews.text: So cute. But it was so little for my one year old. This is more for new born babies on less than 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Valdez

product_meta.title: Original Baby Elephant Ears Head Support Pillow for Stroller, Swing, Bouncer, Changing Table, Car Seat, etc. (Woodland Wonder)
feature_bullets: BABY SUPPORT PILLOW - This colorful Woodland Wonder baby neck support pillow by Baby Elephant Ears helps to support a baby’s head more comfortably while in a stroller, bouncy seat, or swing. It works well for infants, babies, and young children. Gently slide this cute baby support pillow behind the baby’s neck, make sure they are down to the bottom of your baby’s neck, and pull the lower-end of the “ears” to be slightly in front of your baby’s shoulders.

RECOMMENDED SUPPORT - There is no padding behind the neck so the baby’s head isn’t pushed forward, simply supported from the sides. The Baby Elephant Ears pillow gives gentle neck and head support for baby and infants.

STROLLER SUPPORT CUSHION - You can use this infant support pillow as a perfect stroller support for baby. Very young babies cannot hold up their own heads until their neck muscles fully develop and strengthen. Baby Elephant Ears created this baby neck support pillow with that very special need in mind. Use this stroller support for baby even after infancy to give added comfort, stability, and support.

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS - Made of 100% cotton fabric and 100% polyester fill, it measures 9.1 x 13 x 2 inches. We are committed to being an eco-conscious business–we use ethical, local manufacturing, and have a carbon-neutral green website.

PROPER POSTURE FOR BABIES - Baby Elephant Ears are recommended for ages 0-2 and beyond. Our baby pillow supports neck and head with superior support, encouraging healthy, strong posture development. Originally created to assist babies in the infant through 2 years old stages, it can be used as long as it fits your child properly and comfortably.
